keyMoments.title: Luffy Protects Shirahoshi Underwater
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates the crew's post-timeskip strength by fighting effectively underwater to protect Shirahoshi from Hody Jones.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the results of the two-year training period and the crew's readiness for the New World.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Takes On Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: Zoro volunteers to fight the transformed Hyouzou, calling it 'warmup for the New World,' showing the crew's confidence.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's confidence in their abilities after training.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.joinCircumstances: Member who sought to become an officer but was killed by Hyouzou during his rampage.

keyMoments.title: Hody Defeats Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones eliminates his former ally Vander Decken IX, establishing himself as the sole leader of the invasion force.
keyMoments.significance: Consolidates Hody's power and removes the unstable alliance.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Distribution
keyMoments.description: Zeo gives Wadatsumi an Energy Steroid to manipulate him into fighting, showing the crew's reliance on the dangerous pills.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the manipulative tactics and dangerous reliance on Energy Steroids.

keyMoments.title: Hyouzou's Transformation
keyMoments.description: Hyouzou overdoses on Energy Steroids, transforming and losing control, attacking allies and enemies indiscriminately.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the severe side effects and loss of control from Energy Steroid abuse.

keyMoments.title: Internal Casualties
keyMoments.description: Hyouzou kills crew member Nuru during his rampage, showing the crew's self-destructive nature.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the Energy Steroids cause more harm than good to the crew.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with sharp teeth and a crown-like head ornament

keyMoments.title: Captain's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Captain Vander Decken IX is decisively defeated by Hody Jones, effectively ending the Flying Pirates' involvement in the conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Flying Pirates as a threat in this arc.
